title: Crystal Ballroom
description: The official site for McMenamins Crystal Ballroom, tickets on sale now. Buy Tickets Online, by phone at 1-855-CAS-TIXX or from our Crystal Box Office.
cleaned_text: The Crystal Ballroom 1332 W. Burnside Portland OR 97209 (503) 225-0047 Where On Any Night, Anything Can Happen!! In these walls... The historic Crystal Ballroom -- now over a century old -- is one of those rare concert halls that can point to a proud, diverse [history](/1902-cbr-ballroom-history) while also laying claim to an ongoing musical legacy. Every time you enter this majestic ballroom, let your imagination sense the tremors resonating from a century's worth of gatherings, and realize that you are joining a thriving, generations-long procession of show-goers. Welcome! Crystal Ballroom and/or Lola's Room Passport Stamps You're able to get the Crystal Ballroom & Lola's Room stamps in your Passport by attending a concert in those spaces. Sign up for our Passport emails by [registering here](https://portal.mcmenamins.com/passportregistration.aspx) for all the latest updates and upcoming events.
